name: Dragon Voice Command File
summary: Learn about .DVC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Dragon NaturallySpeaking scripts are written in a proprietary language. They can execute a set of keystrokes or run custom actions that launch applications, select user interface elements, control the mouse, produce audio, and perform other operations.
NOTE: Nuance has discontinued Dragon NaturallySpeaking.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
